saas.name: Twitter Search
saas.heading: Instant Twitter Search
saas.subheading: **Powerful & instant search** across your entire Twitter history. Powered by Algolia.

pricingPlans.name: Free
features: Search across your 100 most recent tweets
Syncing with your Twitter activity is disabled
Perfect to try things out before upgrading

pricingPlans.name: Pro
features: Instant search across all of your personal and liked tweets
Regular syncing of your Twitter activity (coming soon)
Extremely fast and relevant personal Twitter search
